name: Apostle's Blessing
oracle_text:
({W/P} can be paid with either {W} or 2 life.)
Target artifact or creature you control gains protection from artifacts or from the color of your choice until end of turn.

name: Artillerize
oracle_text:
As an additional cost to cast this spell, sacrifice an artifact or creature.
Artillerize deals 5 damage to any target.
flavor_text: Phyrexian or Mirran, most goblins stick to the job they know best.

name: Blighted Agent
oracle_text:
Infect (This creature deals damage to creatures in the form of -1/-1 counters and to players in the form of poison counters.)
Blighted Agent can't be blocked.
flavor_text:
"Urabrask may suspect our surveillance, but he cannot stop it."
—Avaricta, Gitaxian sective

name: Blinding Souleater
oracle_text: {W/P}, {T}: Tap target creature. ({W/P} can be paid with either {W} or 2 life.)
flavor_text:
"We thank the souleaters for inscribing our souls with subservience, to reinforce the sacred order."
—Drones' hymn of gratitude

name: Blind Zealot
oracle_text:
Intimidate (This creature can't be blocked except by artifact creatures and/or creatures that share a color with it.)
Whenever Blind Zealot deals combat damage to a player, you may sacrifice it. If you do, destroy target creature that player controls.

name: Chained Throatseeker
oracle_text:
Infect (This creature deals damage to creatures in the form of -1/-1 counters and to players in the form of poison counters.)
Chained Throatseeker can't attack unless defending player is poisoned.

name: Death-Hood Cobra
oracle_text:
{1}{G}: Death-Hood Cobra gains reach until end of turn.
{1}{G}: Death-Hood Cobra gains deathtouch until end of turn.

name: Defensive Stance
oracle_text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets -1/+1.
flavor_text:
"It isn't for fighting. It's for when the fighting's gone bad."
—Kara Vrist, Mirran resistance

name: Dementia Bat
oracle_text:
Flying
{4}{B}, Sacrifice Dementia Bat: Target player discards two cards.
flavor_text:
"When terror outweighs all other thoughts, they will understand that I am the true Father of Machines."
—Azax-Azog, the Demon Thane

name: Evil Presence
oracle_text:
Enchant land
Enchanted land is a Swamp.
flavor_text:
"The Accorders would lament the transformation of their cherished lands, had they lived to see it."
—Sheoldred, Whispering One

name: Flameborn Viron
flavor_text:
"Large or small, all will toil for the Great Work."
—Decree of Urabrask

name: Forced Worship
oracle_text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature can't attack.
{2}{W}: Return Forced Worship to its owner's hand.
flavor_text: Imprisonment teaches revenge. Hobbling teaches resignation.

name: Furnace Scamp
oracle_text: Whenever Furnace Scamp deals combat damage to a player, you may sacrifice it. If you do, Furnace Scamp deals 3 damage to that player.
flavor_text: Born of the core, and dying to stoke it.

name: Geth's Verdict
oracle_text: Target player sacrifices a creature and loses 1 life.
flavor_text:
"Everyone should owe you something."
—Geth, Lord of the Vault

name: Glissa's Scorn
oracle_text: Destroy target artifact. Its controller loses 1 life.
flavor_text:
"If it were fit to survive, it wouldn't have been so easily put down."
—Glissa

name: Glistener Elf
oracle_text: Infect (This creature deals damage to creatures in the form of -1/-1 counters and to players in the form of poison counters.)
flavor_text: "Beg me for life, and I will fill you with the glory of Phyrexian perfection."

name: Gremlin Mine
oracle_text:
{1}, {T}, Sacrifice Gremlin Mine: It deals 4 damage to target artifact creature.
{1}, {T}, Sacrifice Gremlin Mine: Remove up to four charge counters from target noncreature artifact.

name: Grim Affliction
oracle_text: Put a -1/-1 counter on target creature, then proliferate. (Choose any number of permanents and/or players, then give each another counter of each kind already there.)
flavor_text: Even the small wounds let hope bleed out.

name: Hovermyr
oracle_text: Flying, vigilance
flavor_text: Originally created to harvest blinkmoths, the hovermyr are now the silent observers of a dying world.

name: Immolating Souleater
oracle_text: {R/P}: Immolating Souleater gets +1/+0 until end of turn. ({R/P} can be paid with either {R} or 2 life.)
flavor_text:
"We thank the souleaters for melting the sinful that we may be reminded of our own insignificance."
—Drones' hymn of gratitude

name: Impaler Shrike
oracle_text:
Flying
Whenever Impaler Shrike deals combat damage to a player, you may sacrifice it. If you do, draw three cards.
flavor_text:
"Interrogation is an unnecessary step for acquiring information."
—Politus, Gitaxian morphologist

name: Insatiable Souleater
oracle_text: {G/P}: Insatiable Souleater gains trample until end of turn. ({G/P} can be paid with either {G} or 2 life.)
flavor_text:
"We thank the souleaters for culling our sick so that the strong may earn their triumphs."
—Drones' hymn of gratitude

name: Leeching Bite
oracle_text: Target creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn. Another target creature gets -1/-1 until end of turn.
flavor_text: A substantial portion of Vorinclex's forces became fuel for the rest.

name: Lost Leonin
oracle_text: Infect (This creature deals damage to creatures in the form of -1/-1 counters and to players in the form of poison counters.)
flavor_text: Mirrans were broken down and rebuilt, made to be loyal servants of the force they had fought.

name: Loxodon Convert
flavor_text: Just one drop of the glistening oil can eventually stain even a soul as stalwart as a loxodon's beyond redemption.

name: Maul Splicer
oracle_text:
When Maul Splicer enters the battlefield, create two 3/3 colorless Phyrexian Golem artifact creature tokens.
Golem creatures you control have trample.

name: Mortis Dogs
oracle_text:
Whenever Mortis Dogs attacks, it gets +2/+0 until end of turn.
When Mortis Dogs dies, target player loses life equal to its power.

name: Mutagenic Growth
oracle_text:
({G/P} can be paid with either {G} or 2 life.)
Target creature gets +2/+2 until end of turn.
flavor_text:
"Sympathy is for weaklings. Whoever survives, wins."
—Benzir, archdruid of Temple Might

name: Mycosynth Wellspring
oracle_text: When Mycosynth Wellspring enters the battlefield or is put into a graveyard from the battlefield, you may search your library for a basic land card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle.
flavor_text: The oil created the mycosynth. The mycosynth created New Phyrexia.

name: Numbing Dose
oracle_text:
Enchant artifact or creature
Enchanted permanent doesn't untap during its controller's untap step.
At the beginning of the upkeep of enchanted permanent's controller, that player loses 1 life.

name: Ogre Menial
oracle_text:
Infect (This creature deals damage to creatures in the form of -1/-1 counters and to players in the form of poison counters.)
{R}: Ogre Menial gets +1/+0 until end of turn.

name: Parasitic Implant
oracle_text:
Enchant creature
At the beginning of your upkeep, enchanted creature's controller sacrifices it and you create a 1/1 colorless Phyrexian Myr artifact creature token.

name: Pestilent Souleater
oracle_text: {B/P}: Pestilent Souleater gains infect until end of turn. ({B/P} can be paid with either {B} or 2 life. A creature with infect deals damage to creatures in the form of -1/-1 counters and to players in the form of poison counters.)

name: Phyrexian Hulk
flavor_text: An invasion weapon of ages past, the glistening oil contained the blueprints of countless atrocities.

name: Pith Driller
oracle_text:
({B/P} can be paid with either {B} or 2 life.)
When Pith Driller enters the battlefield, put a -1/-1 counter on target creature.
flavor_text: After boring up through the crust of Mirrodin, it turned its expertise upon the surface dwellers.

name: Porcelain Legionnaire
oracle_text:
({W/P} can be paid with either {W} or 2 life.)
First strike
flavor_text:
"My new design has lightweight plating specially cultivated from heretics' spare tissues."
—Izathel, priest of the Annex

name: Pristine Talisman
oracle_text: {T}: Add {C}. You gain 1 life.
flavor_text:
"Tools and artisans can be destroyed, but the act of creation is inviolate."
—Elspeth Tirel

name: Psychic Barrier
oracle_text: Counter target creature spell. Its controller loses 1 life.
flavor_text:
"I tolerate Phyrexians because the dragon requires it. But I have no patience for uninvited guests."
—Tezzeret

name: Razor Swine
oracle_text:
First strike
Infect (This creature deals damage to creatures in the form of -1/-1 counters and to players in the form of poison counters.)
flavor_text:
"They aren't helping the forges. Send them to the surface."
—Furnace boss, sector 12

name: Remember the Fallen
oracle_text:
Choose one or both —
• Return target creature card from your graveyard to your hand.
• Return target artifact card from your graveyard to your hand.
flavor_text: When the Mirrans had fallen, Planeswalkers carried the burden of remembrance.

name: Rotted Hystrix
flavor_text: Vorinclex had no grand plan. The oil did its own work, evolving creatures into worthy predators.

name: Ruthless Invasion
oracle_text:
({R/P} can be paid with either {R} or 2 life.)
Nonartifact creatures can't block this turn.
flavor_text:
"For the survival of our people, every conflict must now end in retreat."
—Pythor, Mirran resistance

name: Scrapyard Salvo
oracle_text: Scrapyard Salvo deals damage to target player or planeswalker equal to the number of artifact cards in your graveyard.
flavor_text:
"Squealstokers! Build me a glorious pile of Mirran metal. Then add yourselves to the pile."
—Furnace boss, sector 11

name: Sensor Splicer
oracle_text:
When Sensor Splicer enters the battlefield, create a 3/3 colorless Phyrexian Golem artifact creature token.
Golem creatures you control have vigilance.

name: Shriek Raptor
oracle_text:
Flying
Infect (This creature deals damage to creatures in the form of -1/-1 counters and to players in the form of poison counters.)
flavor_text:
"That's no glint hawk. The skies have changed for the worse."
—Ria Ivor, White Sun partisan

name: Slash Panther
oracle_text:
({R/P} can be paid with either {R} or 2 life.)
Haste
flavor_text: It runs an endless circuit along the ruined roads of the soon-to-be-forgotten Mirran civilization.

name: Spined Thopter
oracle_text:
({U/P} can be paid with either {U} or 2 life.)
Flying
flavor_text:
"I appreciate the depravity of noble designs turned to devious ends."
—Tezzeret

name: Spire Monitor
oracle_text:
Flash (You may cast this spell any time you could cast an instant.)
Flying
flavor_text: Each monitor is given an eye for each spire it is to guard.

name: Suture Priest
oracle_text:
Whenever another creature enters the battlefield under your control, you may gain 1 life.
Whenever a creature enters the battlefield under an opponent's control, you may have that player lose 1 life.

name: Thundering Tanadon
oracle_text:
({G/P} can be paid with either {G} or 2 life.)
Trample
flavor_text:
"We do not need beakers and vials to test our predators."
—Vorinclex, Voice of Hunger

name: Toxic Nim
oracle_text:
Infect (This creature deals damage to creatures in the form of -1/-1 counters and to players in the form of poison counters.)
{B}: Regenerate Toxic Nim.
flavor_text: The nim have become roving killers marshaled by whichever thane holds tenuous leadership.

name: Trespassing Souleater
oracle_text: {U/P}: Trespassing Souleater can't be blocked this turn. ({U/P} can be paid with either {U} or 2 life.)
flavor_text:
"We thank the souleaters for surveilling our lives that we may be preserved from our own ignorance."
—Drones' hymn of gratitude

name: Vapor Snag
oracle_text: Return target creature to its owner's hand. Its controller loses 1 life.
flavor_text:
"This creature is inadequate. Send it to the splicers for innovation."
—Malcator, Executor of Synthesis

name: Vault Skirge
oracle_text:
({B/P} can be paid with either {B} or 2 life.)
Flying
Lifelink (Damage dealt by this creature also causes you to gain that much life.)
flavor_text: From the remnants of the dead, Geth forged a swarm to safeguard his throne.

name: Victorious Destruction
oracle_text: Destroy target artifact or land. Its controller loses 1 life.
flavor_text:
"The refugees look at these structures with hope. We must relieve them of this burden."
—Juex, tormentor exarch

name: Viridian Betrayers
oracle_text: Viridian Betrayers has infect as long as an opponent is poisoned. (It deals damage to creatures in the form of -1/-1 counters and to players in the form of poison counters.)
flavor_text: To secure a place in Phyrexia's ranks, they hunted their surviving kin.

name: Viridian Harvest
oracle_text:
Enchant artifact
When enchanted artifact is put into a graveyard, you gain 6 life.
flavor_text:
"In the midst of horror beyond imagining, I still see things that lift my heart."
—Ezuri

name: Volt Charge
oracle_text: Volt Charge deals 3 damage to any target. Proliferate. (Choose any number of permanents and/or players, then give each another counter of each kind already there.)

name: War Report
oracle_text: You gain life equal to the number of creatures on the battlefield plus the number of artifacts on the battlefield.
flavor_text: Underling Ethu's 263rd report read simply "Yes, my lord. Overwhelmingly, my lord." This marked the end of the Mirran-Phyrexian War.
